title: # 332 - Greg Fitzsimmons, Alison Rosen, & ME
description:
I sit down with Greg Fitzsimmons and Alison Rosen to talk about drinking, sex, Liam Neeson, Gregs Bill Murray story, Alisons pregnancy, getting naked at parties, and much more!

Check out Greg and Alisons Podcast "Childish" on iTunes

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get $60 off today at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Mercari. Don’t let your old stuff go to waste. You can find Mercari on the app stores or at www.mercari.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Open Fit. Get a free 30 day trial and lose up to 15 pounds by texting “Bert” to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Capterra. Visit www.capterra.com/bert to find the right tool for your business 

 Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
